name: Five-Pin Bowling Quiz for Experts |  Sports Other

questions.text: What year was five-pin bowling invented?
questions.explanation:
1909.

	It was also the same year as the Husted, Colorado, Train Wreck in August which killed dozens of passengers.

questions.text: Name one of the 2 game scores that are not possible in five-pin bowling?
questions.explanation:
1 & 449 & one.

	There are no pins that count as one so those two scores are impossible.

questions.text: True or False: the bowling balls in five-pin are smaller than the balls in ten-pin?
What score is a perfect game in five-pin?
